results.title: Proteomic and functional annotation analysis of injured peripheral nerves reveals ApoE as a protein upregulated by injury that is modulated by metformin treatment
results.text_hl: Our data identify a key association of @GENE_APOE @GENE_348 @@@ApoE@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Peripheral_Nerve_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059348 @@@PNI@@@ that is regulated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.
